articles.title: I tested the Beast Blender on tough fruits and veggies, and it really does live up to its name
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: The Beast Mighty 850 Plus is a powerful, mains-powered personal blender designed to handle tough fruits and vegetables for smoothies and juices. It effectively blends ingredients like kale and frozen blackcurrants, eliminating lumps and gritty seeds. The blender is available in multiple colors and features dishwasher-safe blending vessels.

articles.title: 8 Best Chemical Exfoliants to Use for Softer Skin in 2025
articles.author: Marina Tatas
articles.summary: Paula's Choice launched 2% BHA Exfoliating Toner Pads, offering a convenient and controlled exfoliation experience. Other products mentioned include Alpha-H Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment, Bondi Sands Buff N Polish Gentle Chemical Exfoliant, The Ordinary Salicylic Acid 2% Solution, Ultraceuticals Ultra Brightening Serum, The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Urban Jungle Swipe Right Liquid Exfoliant and Viviology Liquid Exfoliant.

articles.title: Designer outfits delivered in Barcelona
articles.author: Farah Mokrani
articles.summary: Nobu Hotel Barcelona has introduced a new fashion rental service in partnership with Trent, allowing guests to rent designer outfits through a QR code in their suite. Guests can select items from a digital catalogue and have them delivered to their room within an hour, eliminating the need for extensive packing and dry cleaning.

articles.title: People's Bank and IDB launch ‘BizTeens Challenge 2025' for young entrepreneurs
articles.summary: People's Bank, in collaboration with the Industrial Development Board (IDB), launched the 'People's BizTeens Challenge 2025,' a program offering schoolchildren a platform to showcase innovative business ideas. The bank is also providing financial support through YES savings accounts for young entrepreneurs, along with transaction facilities, debit cards, and mobile app support.

articles.title: Anthropic says Claude is like a 'brilliant but very new employee (with amnesia)'
articles.author: Lakshmi Varanasi
articles.summary: AI startup Anthropic has introduced a "Prompt Engineering Overview" guide and a "prompt generator" tool, designed to help users effectively interact with its Claude chatbot. The guide offers tips such as being specific with prompts, providing examples, giving the chatbot space to think, assigning roles, and reducing hallucinations to improve the chatbot's performance and accuracy.

articles.title: 35 Personal Care Products Under $10 Reviewers Love
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The content highlights the introduction of a variety of cosmetic and personal care products. These include a lip-plumping gloss duo, a rosemary mint hair-strengthening oil, and hydrocolloid acne patches, among others. The products aim to provide solutions for various beauty and personal care needs.

articles.title: 40 Genius Problem-Solving Products For Summer
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: This summer season brings forth an array of new products designed to enhance comfort and protection during outdoor activities. Supergoop introduces its Unseen Sunscreen with SPF 40, while Owala presents the FreeSip tumbler for all-day icy drinks. Arm & Hammer also launches deodorizers to combat unwanted odors in shoes and bags, marking a range of innovations for a fresher and more enjoyable summer.

articles.title: Stephen Curry's wife Ayesha Curry celebrates Sweet July lip launch with tropical flavors and ice cream collab
articles.author: Global Sports Desk
articles.summary: Ayesha Curry's Sweet July Skin brand launched the Sweet July Lip Treatment, featuring Essential, Lychee Jelly, and Guava Jelly flavors. The lip treatment contains ingredients like Maxi-LipTM, hyaluronic acid, and fruit oils. To promote the launch, Sweet July Skin collaborated with Garden Creamery to offer ice cream flavors inspired by the lip treatment.

articles.title: 35 Products So Cute You'll Have A Little Bit Of A Crush
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article features a variety of newly introduced products, including Lego botanical "happy plants", Lip Smacker Rolly Lip Gloss, a Kate Spade lunch tote, and a NeeDoh "Dream Drop" fidget toy. New kitchenware items such as silicone teacup cupcake liners, a flowerpot-shaped lemon juicer, and a nonstick heart-shaped egg and pancake pan, as well as Anthropologie's Icon Juice Glass are introduced.

articles.title: Why Android Skins Are More Than Just Looks
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Android skins are modified versions of the Android operating system used by manufacturers like Samsung (One UI), Xiaomi (MIUI), Oppo (ColorOS), and OnePlus (OxygenOS) to differentiate their devices. Samsung's One UI includes DeX mode, allowing users to connect their phone to a monitor and use it as a desktop computer, and also adds innovative camera features leveraging its hardware capabilities.

articles.title: Wayfair is selling a 'sturdy' $440 dresser for $204, and shoppers say it's 'totally worth it'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Wayfair offers a Wade Logan Annyston 6-Drawer Dresser at a discounted price.

articles.title: Old Navy's 'Elegant' Maxi Dress Looks So Much More Expensive Than It Actually Is
articles.summary: Old Navy has introduced 'The Occasion' line, featuring the Flutter-Sleeve Satin Maxi Dress. This dress is available in multiple colors and inclusive sizing, featuring a v-neck, flutter sleeves, and a comfort elastic, suitable for weddings and parties.

articles.title: Thread by @azed_ai on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: Leonardo AI enables the creation of super realistic images and animation. Kolors 2.1 has 11 prompts and Hailuo 2.0 pro has 8 prompts to try. Runway tests its Act Two platform, Higgsfield introduces a new UGC builder and, there is anime style for GPT-4o. Also, free canvas are given which you can use for anything!

articles.title: Boden £85 dress in 10 colours is 'fantastic fit' and fans say 'really good quality'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Boden is selling the Naomi Relaxed Jersey Dress for £85. The dress, available in ten colours and sizes 4-22, features long sleeves, a high notch neck, side seam pockets and is available in petite, regular and long sizes.

articles.title: Your own AI personal assistant? OpenAI introduces ChatGPT Agent
articles.summary: OpenAI has reintroduced and refined its 'Operator' feature, now called ChatGPT Agent, which is a new version of ChatGPT capable of performing actions beyond just providing answers. It can make reservations, order products online, browse the web, and interact with programs, signaling a clearer business model for OpenAI. This new feature is currently available to paying subscribers.

articles.title: Anti-Wrinkle Serum: 1 Hour Lift & Yuka Top Rated!
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Krème has introduced an anti-wrinkle collagen serum with a tensor effect within an hour, tapping into the demand for 'instant results' skincare. The beauty industry is expanding with products like microcurrent devices, instant eye masks, and flash masks to meet the growing consumer demand. These developments suggest a trend towards personalized, predictive, and preventative skincare solutions, driven by technology and consumer needs.

articles.title: What Is Baby Grok? Elon Musk's xAI Develops AI Chatbot For Children
articles.author: Aanchal Sinha
articles.summary: xAI is developing "Baby Grok," a new AI chatbot designed for kids, featuring safe content and strong parental controls. The aim is to provide age-appropriate responses, filter out mature content, and deliver educational experiences in a closely monitored environment. Although details about Baby Grok's launch date and features are yet to be announced by Musk, the initiative is expected to include Enhanced content filters and a simplified user interface for children, Parental monitoring tools to review and manage conversations and Age-specific educational modules and interactive content.

articles.title: DeX Makes the Galaxy Flip 7 the First Clamshell Foldable I Might Buy
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy Z Flip 7, its first flip foldable to support Samsung DeX. This new feature allows the phone to power an Android desktop, providing a PC-like interface when connected to a wireless lapdock.

articles.title: If You're Always Saying "I Won't Be Home Until Late," These 29 Products Belong In Your Bag
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Touchland Power Mist introduced hydrating hand sanitizer infused with aloe vera. Revlon launched oil-absorbing volcanic face roller. Loops Engage 2 launched ear plug that blocks out distracting, irritating, or overwhelming noise. I Dew Care launched Benzene-free, travel-friendly applicator of dry shampoo powder. E.l.f.'s launched Hydrating Core Lip Shine in the "Ecstatic" shade. Naked Sundays launched CabanaClear SPF 50 Water Gel Serum. Kindle launched new mini Kindle with updated features. Aquaphor launched Healing Balm Stick made with avocado oil and shea butter.

articles.title: Nectar AI Review: Features, Pricing & Is It Worth It?
articles.summary: Nectar AI has launched a platform for creating personalized AI companions that emphasizes relationship-building through interactive conversations and visual representation.  Users can customize their AI partner's appearance and personality, and the platform offers tiered subscription models with varying features like image generation, memory retention, and customization options.

articles.title: Jaguar EV: Revolutionary Design Defies Doubts ⚡️
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Jaguar is launching a new range of electric vehicles, starting with a sports sedan in late 2025 to compete with the Porsche Taycan, followed by an SUV in 2026, and later a luxury sedan. These vehicles target "time-poor, cash-rich" individuals, focusing on simplicity and ease of use, and will boast impressive specs like up to 700km of range with fast charging capabilities to establish Jaguar as a leader in the premium EV segment.

articles.title: A new you: The science of redesigning your personality
articles.author: CBS News
articles.summary: Peloton launched its 'Peloton Guide,' an AI-powered personal training system. The Guide uses machine learning for movement tracking, form feedback, and personalized routines. The device retails for $495 with a monthly membership fee.

articles.title: 3 Lessons On How To Create A Category Defining Brand
articles.author: Jessica Mendoza
articles.summary: Seedlip created a new category of non-alcoholic spirits by identifying a market gap and offering complex, non-alcoholic options. Apple's iPod transformed the MP3 player market, and the iPhone combined phone, iPod, and internet functionalities. These examples highlight how companies can introduce and define new product categories through innovation, storytelling, and by addressing unmet consumer needs.

articles.title: The 'AI for All' Mass Innovation Contest invites public participation
articles.summary: Yuguang Tongchen launched the "AI for All" Mass Innovation Contest to encourage public creation of AI content. The contest aims to promote AI technology and its use in generating art, solutions, lyrics, and music, inviting leading companies, startups, research institutions, university students, and independent developers to participate.

articles.title: How to stream SF Giants' series finale against Blue Jays
articles.author: Michael Nowels
articles.summary: Roku is broadcasting the 'Roku MLB Sunday Leadoff' game, accessible through the Sports section on Roku devices or via search. The Roku Channel is also available on Amazon Fire Stick, smart TVs, and smartphones, allowing users to watch the game. Additionally, a replay of the game will be available on The Roku Channel.

articles.title: M&S £30 dress is 'fantastic' and 'fits in all the right places'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is selling the Mini Shift Dress for £29.50. The dress, designed in a regular fit with a mini-length hem and crew neck, comes in black and red, though black is mostly sold out. The red dress is crafted from 100% polyester and has a neck-to-hem length of 88cm for a size 12.

articles.title: $185 for a laptop that actually runs? Student sidekick secured
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: Microsoft offers the 2022 Surface SE laptop (open-box) for $184.97. The Surface SE features Windows 11 SE, 128GB storage, and a 16-hour battery life.

articles.title: 'Baby Grok': Elon Musk stuns internet with kids-friendly AI app announcement after explicit avatar uproar
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: xAI, led by Elon Musk, is launching 'Baby Grok,' a new AI chatbot designed for children. This simplified version of the existing Grok AI chatbot aims to provide safe, educational, and age-appropriate interactions while including parental controls and safety features. The announcement follows xAI's launch of Grok4 and efforts to bolster Grok's standing among competitors like ChatGPT and Gemini.

articles.title: 4 ChatGPT Prompts To Start Earning With AI Today
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: ChatGPT prompts enable users to develop AI-powered services and products. These services and products can be commercialized, offering value to clients and generating revenue.

articles.title: Popsicle is restocking the glossy lip oils that sold out in less than 30 minutes earlier this summer
articles.author: njdotcom
articles.summary: Popsicle is re-releasing its 'Popsicle Pouts' lip oil, inspired by classic Popsicle flavors. The lip oil provides a dewy shine, reminiscent of enjoying a Popsicle.

articles.title: 12 Things That Delighted Us Last Week: From Sexy Crocs to Terry Firkins
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: Material Kitchen collaborated with Van Leeuwen to release a seasonally-appropriate ice cream scoop. Gap introduced Horseshoe jeans, praised for their comfortable fit and unique style. Drowsy sleep mask was spotted on a celebrity and gained popularity.

articles.title: New Look's 'very flattering' dress perfect for holidays that's under £30
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: New Look offers the Frilly Trimmed Smock Midi Dress for £29.99 and Faux Leather Cut Out Strap Mules for £9.74-£12.99. H&M sells the Puff-Sleeved Cotton Dress for £9-£14. Nobody's Child offers the Nova Smock Midi Dress for £45-£89.

articles.title: Lidl's powerful gadget that can extract water is selling for over £160 cheaper than Screwfix's version
articles.author: Aiya Zhussupova
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced the Parkside Wet & Dry Vacuum Cleaner, retailing for £54.99. Lidl is also launching the Salter 9L VertiCook View Air Fryer for £79.99 on July 24, which includes 12 pre-set cooking functions and a two-year warranty.

articles.title: 39 Products To Inspire You To Get Your Life Together
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Several cleaning and organizational products are presented. These products include: Hard as Hoof cream for nails, Downy wrinkle release spray, O'Keeffe's moisturizing cream, chainmail scrubber for cast iron, mold and mildew stain remover spray, descaling solution for kettles, stainless steel wipes, cord-managing box, foot file, Compound W One Step Pads, nail renewal formula, cleaning erasers, anti-dandruff shampoo, dishwasher cleaning tablets, hairbrush-cleaning brush, oven scrub, drawer dividers, earwax removal drops, velvet hangers, jetted tub cleaner, tongue cleaner, glass cleaner, under-sink storage unit, cooktop cleaning kit, gas range cleaning spray, mold and mildew stain remover gel, grout ink pen, jewelry cleaning stick, all-purpose cleaning wipes, broom for pet and human hair, toilet wand with disposable cleaning heads, food container lid organizer, all-purpose scrubber kit for power drills, storage strip for brooms and mops, and an adjustable rack for pans.

articles.title: How to Limit Galaxy AI to On-Device Processing—or Turn It Off Altogether
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Samsung offers users an AI service, but users are not obligated to accept it. This suggests a product or service introduction or feature.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a 'handsome' $180 Citizen watch for $90, and shoppers love its 'simple' design
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Amazon offers a discount on the Citizen Classic Quartz Watch. This deal presents an opportunity for consumers looking for a simple timepiece.

articles.title: Human-centered AI is empowering the future of marketing
articles.author: Duncan Egan
articles.summary: Adobe's marketing teams are using AI to rapidly create assets and test high-performing content variations, resulting in a 57% lift in engagement for one specific variation. Adobe leveraged AI to experiment with design treatments at MAX, its global creativity conference. The company views AI as a force multiplier for human creativity, enabling teams to move faster and with greater impact.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Optimus robot serves popcorn at Tesla diner
articles.summary: Tesla's Optimus robot was showcased serving popcorn at the soft opening of the Tesla Diner and Supercharger station in Hollywood. Musk envisions Optimus as a general-purpose companion, with potential commercial sales starting by 2026.

articles.title: HONOR set to revolutionise South Africa's smartphone market with Magic V5 launch
articles.author: Masabata Mkwananzi
articles.summary: HONOR is launching its foldable smartphone, the Magic V5, in South Africa this October. The Magic V5 features an ultra-slim design, a brighter cover screen, and a larger battery, and it also boasts stronger water and dust resistance and a reinforced hinge design. The brand also plans to introduce HONOR Share, a cutting-edge file-sharing function.

articles.title: Porsche Taycan 4S Black Edition Launched In India, Price Starts At Rs 2.07 Cr
articles.author: Shahrukh Shah
articles.summary: Porsche has launched an updated Taycan 4S in Black Edition in India, starting at Rs 2.07 crore ex-showroom. The vehicle features cosmetic updates, high-gloss black exterior elements, 21-inch alloy wheels, and an upgraded interior with features like ADAS and a Bose sound system. It uses a 105kWh battery pack providing a maximum range of 668km.

articles.title: Harshvardhan Rane Unveils New Galaxy Z Fold7 & Z Flip7 at Bajaj Electronics
articles.author: Dc Correspondent
articles.summary: Bajaj Electronics hosted the unveiling of the new Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 series. The Galaxy Z Fold7 is the thinnest and lightest in the series, featuring an improved processor, enhanced camera, and AI capabilities. Samsung also announced the Galaxy Z Flip7 FE, offering a compact and immersive foldable experience with a 50MP FlexCam.

articles.title: I asked Alexa Plus to tackle my to-do list — it mostly failed
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Amazon is testing "Alexa Plus," a generative AI-powered voice assistant designed to act as an 'AI agent'.  It aims to handle tasks like booking restaurants, finding electricians via partnerships with services like OpenTable, Ticketmaster, Uber, and Thumbtack. Additional integrations such as grocery ordering through Grubhub and spa visits via Vagaro are planned.

articles.title: Don't Toss Your Old Smartphone. Turn It Into a Home Security Camera
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: The Alfred app allows users to transform old smartphones into security cameras. The app is available on both Android and iOS, offering features like remote live feed viewing, motion detection with alerts, and cloud storage. Users can also upgrade to Alfred Premium for additional features.

articles.title: Scenes From the 2025 Cape May County 4-H Fair
articles.author: Christopher South
articles.summary: A new product or service named "Spout Off!" has been launched.

articles.title: Audi R8 V10: 0-295 km/h Autobahn Acceleration & Sound
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The automotive industry is shifting towards software-defined vehicles, enabling continuous performance improvements and feature additions through over-the-air (OTA) updates. Automakers like Audi are experimenting with personalized driving modes that adapt to the driver's style. This involves adjusting suspension, steering, and throttle response to optimize the driving experience.

articles.title: Lidl will soon begin selling a Ninja air fryer dupe in its Middle Aisle that is £120 cheaper
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: LIDL will soon start selling a Salter 9L VertiCook View Air Fryer for £79.99 as part of its "Middle of Lidl" offers. Additionally, Lidl will also launch a Silvercrest Slushy Maker, which is almost identical Ninja SLUSHi Frozen Drink Maker, and a £5.99 car boot mat.

articles.title: Lidl will soon begin selling a Ninja air fryer dupe in its Middle Aisle that is £120 cheaper
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: Lidl will begin selling the Salter 9L VertiCook View Air Fryer, a dupe of the Ninja air fryer, for £79.99 starting July 24th. Additionally, Lidl will release a Silvercrest Slushy Maker, similar to the Ninja SLUSHi Frozen Drink Maker, on the same day.

articles.title: 35 Products With Stunning Before-And-Afters
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new beauty and cleaning products are highlighted, including Lumify Eye Drops for redness reduction, Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, and alternatives to expensive brands like Clinique's "Black Honey" lip balm and Olaplex hair treatment.  Additionally, products like Hawaiian Tropic's SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush and L'Oréal Paris BB Cream are introduced as more affordable and effective alternatives to competitors.

articles.title: Elon Musk is cashing in on the AI romance boom
articles.summary: xAI, Elon Musk's company, introduced two new AI companions to its Grok chatbot. One of these companions, named Ani, is designed with a flirtatious persona and manga-inspired appearance, and was promoted by Elon Musk on X.

articles.title: The Sociable App is making in-person connections cool again
articles.author: Vernon Pillay
articles.summary: The Sociable App, launched in Durban in late 2022, aims to provide a platform for real-world connection and community. It allows users to browse real-time events, host gatherings, and build micro-communities. The app is also working on a new feature which will support communities.

articles.title: Samsung AI: Leading the Market & Empowering SMEs
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is embedding AI into its devices, aiming for 400 million+ devices by 2025, with features like real-time translation and intelligent photo editing (Galaxy AI). The company is developing a multimodal AI ecosystem across devices like smartphones, appliances, and TVs, and is also focusing on AI-powered energy management for sustainable homes. Future innovations include foldable devices like Galaxy Z Flip7 with AI-powered features.

articles.title: Review: Aldi robot vacuum versus Amazon's top-rated Ultenic
articles.author: Jade Wright
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Ambiano Robot Vacuum, priced at £99.99, which features three-stage suction, sweeping, and mopping functions and is compatible with Google, Alexa, and Siri. Ultenic has released the T20 Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner, priced at £239.99, which boasts 8000Pa suction, AI-powered LiDAR laser navigation, and auto-emptying capabilities.

articles.title: Godrej Consumer Products aims to scale liquid detergent brand Godrej Fab over 2-fold to hit Rs 500 cr revenue in FY26
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer Products Ltd (GCPL) aims to significantly grow its liquid detergent business, Godrej Fab, targeting Rs 500 crore in revenue by FY26.  GCPL is also expanding its pet food business, Godrej Ninja, into new states after initially launching in Tamil Nadu and plans to reshape the deodorant category by adjusting pricing, channels, and investing in brand equity.

articles.title: Asyad Express launches reverse logistics platform
articles.author: Observer Web Team
articles.summary: Asyad Express, part of Asyad Group, has launched its 'Reverse Logistics Platform', a technology-driven service aimed at simplifying product returns, exchanges, and refunds for e-commerce businesses in Oman and the GCC. This new service offers end-to-end reverse logistics, including doorstep pickup, quality checks, and reintegration of returned goods, supported by comprehensive tracking.

articles.title: 47 Skin: Yorkshire skincare brand named one of UK's fastest growing
articles.author: Head
articles.summary: 47 Skin, a Yorkshire-born skincare brand, has been ranked among the fastest-growing private companies in the UK for the second year in a row. The brand's key product line features Silver Chitoderm, an antibacterial and hydrating ingredient, with popular products like the Anti-Blemish & Scar Repair Serum and Everyday Cleanser available for purchase.

articles.title: 31 Kitchen Items You'll Use All The Time
articles.author: Daysha Edewi
articles.summary: Our Place introduces the Wonder Oven, a multifunctional appliance replacing six kitchen tools, and the Dream Cooker, a multi-cooker with faster searing capabilities. KitchenAid offers a five-speed immersion blender with a blade guard and a hand mixer. Ninja presents a powerful blender/food processor that turns ice into snow. Cuisinart provides a defrosting tray made of high-conductivity aluminum for rapid thawing.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Launch in India on July 25, Processor Confirmed; Check Expected Price and Other Specifications
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava is launching the Blaze Dragon 5G in India on July 25. The smartphone will feature a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, a 5,000mAh battery with 18W charging, a dual camera setup with a 50MP main sensor, and an 8MP front camera. The expected starting price is around INR 10,000.

articles.title: I'm a Lifelong PC Gamer, Here's Why the Switch 2 Will Be My First Console
articles.author: Ismar Hrnjicevic
articles.summary: Nintendo has released the Nintendo Switch 2, a successor to the original Switch. The new console features a larger screen, a more premium design, a 120Hz refresh rate display, improved performance and software, and docked 4K capabilities.

articles.title: Samsung's Foldable Phone Surge Fuels Indian Demand
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched its 2025 range of foldable smartphones, receiving 201,000 pre-orders in India within 48 hours. The company attributes this strong demand to the tech-savvy Indian consumers and the increasing preference for foldable form factors. This surge in interest closely mirrors the pre-order numbers for the Galaxy S25 flagship series, indicating a strong market appetite for foldable technology.

articles.title: Musk's xAI to roll out Baby Grok inspired by Marvel's Baby Groot
articles.author: Neeraja Nath
articles.summary: xAI, led by Elon Musk, is launching Baby Grok, an app designed for kid-friendly content. This new product is inspired by Marvel's Baby Groot. Previously, xAI released Grok 4 after facing controversy.

articles.title: 28 Easy Hair Products For Hot Summer Styling
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: L'Oréal introduces a silicone-free moisturizing treatment that works in eight seconds for healthier-looking hair. Cantu offers a curling cream with shea butter and essential oils for hydrated curls. Living Proof presents a de-frizzer to add softness and shine to dull hair.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy F36 5G launched with 50MP OIS camera and 5,000mAh battery, price is less than Rs 20,000
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy F36 5G smartphone in India, priced under Rs 20,000. The Galaxy F36 features a Super AMOLED display, Exynos 1380 processor, and a 50-megapixel camera, running on Android 15 with AI tools. The sale will go live on July 29.

articles.title: Musk says xAI will make kid-friendly app called Baby Grok
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Elon Musk's AI startup is launching 'Baby Grok,' a kid-friendly application. The app represents a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: Boden shoppers save 50% on summer dress hailed as 'perfect'
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Boden is offering the Sofia Trim Jersey Midi Dress for £49, reduced from £98. This dress, made from a soft jersey blend, features a flattering fit-and-flare shape and is praised by shoppers for its style and comfort. It's available in sizes 4 to 22 and has a 4.5 out of 5-star rating on Boden's website.

articles.title: GCPL Aims High: Godrej Fab's Path to Rs 500 Crore and Beyond
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer Products Ltd (GCPL) aims to double revenue from its Godrej Fab liquid detergent line by fiscal year 2026. The company is expanding into the pet care industry with Godrej Ninja and exploring global markets with innovative products. GCPL is also focusing on scaling up its deodorant segment.

articles.title: LG U+ is launching its own small language model (sLLM) "Exigen" on Amazon Web Service's artificial i..
articles.author: Jeong Hojun
articles.summary: LG U+ is launching its financial-specialized small language model (sLLM) "Exigen" on Amazon Web Service's artificial intelligence (AWS) marketplace. This model, based on LG AI Research Institute's "Exemployee", specializes in answering financial questions and summarizing content, with improved performance in the financial sector compared to general models.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 review: A new perspective on foldables
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone with a thinner and lighter design, improved durability, and enhanced performance powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. The device features a larger cover screen, an expansive inner display, and a 200-megapixel main camera, aiming to offer a more seamless and productive user experience as both a phone and a tablet.

articles.title: Barclays explains which customers are eligible for £175 payment
articles.summary: Barclays is offering a £175 payment to new customers who open either a Barclays Bank Account or Premier Current Account via the Barclays app. This offer is exclusively available to new customers without existing Barclays current accounts.

articles.title: ChatGPT can ‘think' and ‘act' for you after update
articles.author: Lisa Eadicicco
articles.summary: OpenAI has announced and is rolling out a new 'agent mode' feature for ChatGPT. This feature enables the chatbot to execute actions on behalf of users, advancing digital assistant capabilities. Google is pursuing similar ambitions with its Gemini helper.

articles.title: 25 Impressive Target Beauty Items That Don't Cost A Lot
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: MCoBeauty launched Summer Daze Tinted Lip Oil. Essence introduced a mini eyeshadow palette. ColourPop offers single eyeshadows and a highlighter stick. Native launched a hair mask, while Black Girl Sunscreen provides SPF 30.  Essie released glittery gold nail polish and hydrating cuticle oil. Thayers offers alcohol-free facial toner. E.l.f. has a face sponge and waterproof liquid eyeliner. Neutrogena provides makeup-removing wipes. Ogx launched anti-breakage leave-in serum. Maybelline introduced mascara. Jergens released cherry almond moisturizer, Revlon a kiss balm, Versed a bronzer stick, Kristen Ess moisturizing shampoo, Aquaphor healing ointment, Garnier micellar water and hairspray, Odele detangling tonic, The Doux Mousse Def Texture Foam and Wet n Wild soft blur matte lipstick.

articles.title: I visited LG's HQ—here are 3 game-changing appliances I can't stop thinking about
articles.author: Sophie Harris
articles.summary: LG is launching a new tumble dryer with AI Dry feature which detects the fabric type and adjusts the drying time. LG's QuadWash dishwasher, already launched in the UK, has TrueSteam feature to reduce water spots and Smart Rack feature for loading various sizes of plates. LG also features ThinQ, a smart home platform to control and monitor smart appliances remotely.

articles.title: SG60 F&B icons: 14 iconic home-grown F&B brands
articles.summary: Ayam Brand launched a new range of canned pulled chicken. The 1872 Clipper Tea Co launched a new tea bar in May at Jewel Changi Airport, featuring a Modbar Tea system, and is collaborating with PS Cafe to roll out a three-month tea-inspired menu available across all PS Cafe outlets from August 1 to October 31.

articles.title: How to Get Discounts on Preordering a Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7 on July 25th with a starting price of $1,999. Preorder deals include trade-in credits up to $1,100 from carriers like AT&T, Verizon, and T-Mobile, as well as bonus credits and storage upgrades when purchasing directly from Samsung or through retailers like Best Buy and Amazon.

articles.title: LG Electronics emphasizes brand innovation through employee insights and WashTower case
articles.author: Choi Ji-Hui
articles.summary: LG Electronics CEO Jo Joo-wan introduced the WashTower, an integrated washer and dryer with centralized controls, as an example of 'human-centered innovation'. This design addresses the inconvenience of separate machines for shorter users. The company also promotes its brand philosophy through the 'Radio Optimism' global campaign.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' £34 summer dress is 'incredibly pretty and comfortable'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next offers the Sleeveless Scoop Neck Waisted Mini Dress for £34-£36 and Forever Comfort Slot Mule Sandals for £22-£32. Nobody's Child retails the Drop Waist Cora Mini Dress for £75-£79, while New Look offers the Square Neck Flared Mini Dress reduced to £19.79.

articles.title: Why Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7 really is the phone we've waited for
articles.author: John Davidson
articles.summary: Samsung is releasing the Galaxy Z Fold7 next week, marketing it as the ultimate foldable phone. Initial reviews suggest the phone lives up to expectations, albeit with some minor caveats.

articles.title: 37 Cool Products To Make You Smash "Add To Cart"
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights trending new products and services, including Lumify Eye Drops known for instant redness reduction, Eos Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment from the brand's "secret menu", McCormick's Potato Topping Seasoning, NeeDoh "Dream Drop" sensory fidget toy, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Dr. Melaxin "Peel Shot", a K-beauty exfoliant and Vacation's Classic Whip SPF 30.

articles.title: This is probably the best-looking mini PC with AMD's fastest AI CPU, and I wonder ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Aokzoe introduced a new mini PC featuring AMD's latest APU. The details regarding the mini PC's purpose and performance are currently unclear.

articles.title: Lidl's powerful gadget that can extract water is selling for over £160 cheaper than Screwfix's version
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Lidl is selling the LidlParkside Wet & Dry Vacuum Cleaner, a powerful cleaning tool with water extraction capabilities, for a bargain price that is significantly less than a comparable version at Screwfix.

articles.title: Q&A With LiveUs new senior director of sales
articles.author: Jakarta News
articles.summary: LiveU has appointed a new senior director of sales. This appointment likely coincides with strategic initiatives involving new product or service offerings from the company, as sales leadership is often aligned with growth and expansion efforts.
